roleset.name: perform a vocal accompaniment
roleset.note: SERENADE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. No VerbNet entry. (from serenade.01-v)

example.name: passive, all args
example.text: Cardboard noisemakers , substitutes for the unavailable tin models , werebeing hawked and bought at makeshift stands every few yards alongBroadway , and [one 's ears]-2 were continually serenaded [*-2]by the horns 'rasps and bleats .
example.arg: by the horns ' rasps and bleats

example.name: transitive
example.text: Outside , in the summertime fields behind the motel , a thousand cricketsserenaded us .
